original_title: For My Country: The History of the National Guard
overview: Learn the impressive story of the National Guard -- the United States' reserve force that has protected the country since the Revolutionary War -- through profiles of individual soldiers and accounts of major events in the organization's history. Legendary musician Pat Boone narrates this military documentary, which chronicles the National Guard from the time of its creation all the way through to the Iraq War.
title: For My Country: The History of the National Guard
